mapper.select: select * from schedule s, schedule_sort ss, schedule_mem sm where s.sch_sort=ss.sch_sort_num and s.sch_num = sm.sch_num and s.act=false and s.team_num=#{param1} group by s.sch_num;
mapper.insert: insert into schedule (team_num, sch_start, sch_end, emp_num, sch_sort, sch_content) values (#{team_num}, #{sch_start}, #{sch_end}, #{emp_num}, #{sch_sort}, #{sch_content});
mapper.select: select emp_num, emp_name from employee where team_num=#{param1};
mapper.delete: update schedule set act=true where sch_num=#{param1};
mapper.insert: insert into alarm (alarm_sort_num, alarm_content, sender, all_num)values(#{alarm_sort_num}, #{alarm_content}, #{sender}, #{all_num});
